column4: hi. how come i cannot copy files or install files into my system? It says I don't have access. How to solve this? Thanks.
no. i'm still new to linux.
so i see installation cant be done like this.
must be using this sudo command only?
can i logon to the admin account by default?
so in linux, most things are done in terminal, rather than using gui?
its easy to pick up if you just sit in linux for a couple of days
the most important things to remember are "sudo" and "man"
so you type it before a command, like "man cp"
that will bring up the user manual for the cp or copy command
